name: Anand Sir
title: Founder & Academic Mentor
intro: With years of focused teaching experience and a deep understanding of the challenges faced by students in semi-urban areas, our founder established The ALPHA CLASSES to bring structured, concept-based coaching to students of Rohtas, Bihar.
bioParagraphs: At The ALPHA CLASSES, we believe that every student can achieve excellent results when guided with the right strategy, discipline, and conceptual clarity. Our classroom culture focuses on understanding rather than memorisation, ensuring that students are confident not only in exams but also in real-life problem solving.

The founder personally designs the academic plans, test structures, and doubt-solving frameworks followed at the institute. Regular interaction with parents and consistent performance tracking ensures that every child receives individual attention.
Over the years, students mentored under him have performed strongly in school examinations and built a solid base for competitive exams, especially in Mathematics and Science.
vision: To build a strong academic foundation for students of Bihar through disciplined coaching, personalised attention, and exam-focused practice.
mission: To create a reliable neighbourhood coaching institute where parents can trust that their child is receiving structured guidance, regular feedback, and a clear roadmap for academic success.
